channel.title: World war 3
channel.description: I just read a book that has solid proof that George bush set up the 9/11 attack and framed Iraq so he had an excuse to invade them while you all thought he was there to get Saddam to give you more oil or to kill him he was actually there to take over his oil operation as 90% of the worlds oil is in the Middle-East, He wants to take their oil because, The world revolves around oil, If you have the oil, The world is yours (kinda). Which in turn caused them to invade the other countries around Russia hoping for even more oil such as Pakistan or Iran and is even starting on Turkey etc, Thanks to George bush Iraq etc has been ripped apart.. The Russian president doesn't like how America is treading on his turf and is getting very angry, And he might attack if they continue in this manner Which might start world war 3? Because if Russia attacks America then other countries that hate America will join in, but also an equal (maybe) amount will defend it causing World war 3.

item.title: World war 3
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

I just hope they halt the nuking until I get to kill someone. I have always wondered what that felt like. It would also relieve a lot of the stress I have building up.

Read full topic

item.title: World war 3
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“wixter, post:30, topic:152626”][quote author=killerman93 link=topic=208804.msg1831353#msg1831353 date=1192828099]
What would happen,the world wouldnt be destroyed, we would, some would survive.
And they will have a disease where all hope is lost for religion, and then, will come the anti-christ.
The anti-christ will turn the world against itself, Isaa(Jesus), will come down with his spear which will pierce the anti-christs only eye, his damaged eye.
Then, the people of the mountains shall escape, eating everything they see.
Then nothing will remain but 3 angels, they will all kill each other, accept Gabriel, who god ends.
Then will begin Judgement Day, at the blow of the Horn.

Thats about it from my point of view
[/quote]
what are u smoking?[/quote]

WW3 theory and Islamic end of the world.

Read full topic
